channel.title: Demented An Epic Re-Imagining of the Golden Age of RS
channel.description:
Demented
◘Media◘
[IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/1h9hdv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/25gqlmr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2jceka9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/21eqm3p.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2cxuamw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2evrthx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/4v4sgk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2ibi6hd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/mkbyvd.png[/img]
○Features○
100% of skills work flawlessly Perfectly balanced PvP All bosses working Working Grand Exchange Amazing Economy Lots of dungeons for monster hunting/slayer PkP shop for PvP rewards Random item drops for PvP (Including artifacts) Party room Pest Control Auto Donating Auto Voting Donator Cape Username changing system Custom loyalty titles Custom user icons Working Duel arena with perfect staking and custom rule sets (DDs only, VLS only, etc.) Amazing Staff Online 24/7 to assure best experience, and staff positions constantly opening Perfect prayer and magic books (Lunars, ancients, curses, etc.) Auto-casting User Friendly Information Panel to display your k/d, voting points, skilling points, etc. Dicing Weekly Lottery Clue Scrolls Custom Quests w/ Rewards Tons of minigames HD minimap 602 NPCs Level 99 Announcements Lootshare Toyhorses Glory Charging Custom PK-Tournament arena Tormented Demons, Godwars Bosses, Corporal Beast, Frost Dragons, and many many more bosses Custom barrows (every player gets their own individual barrows!) Enchanting F-Keys (Old and new) Ring Of Wealth Donator Perks Highscores Max cape Tutorial KDR system Fully working clans Advanced Anti-Cheat system A community of mature, veteran RSPS players who enjoy kicking back and enjoying some RSPS fun
So what are you waiting for? Come join in on the next biggest thing, now! [URL=http://"DementedRSPS.com"]DementedRSPS.com[/URL]

item.title: Demented An Epic Re-Imagining of the Golden Age of RS
item.dc:creator: @J0nsey J0nsey
item.description:
@J0nsey wrote:

Demented

◘Media◘

1h9hdv.png768×506

25gqlmr.png760×495

2jceka9.png762×499


2cxuamw.png748×334

4v4sgk.png762×501


mkbyvd.png764×502

○Features○

100% of skills work flawlessly
Perfectly balanced PvP
All bosses working
Working Grand Exchange
Amazing Economy
Lots of dungeons for monster hunting/slayer
PkP shop for PvP rewards
Random item drops for PvP (Including artifacts)
Party room
Pest Control
Auto Donating
Auto Voting
Donator Cape
Username changing system
Custom loyalty titles
Custom user icons
Working Duel arena with perfect staking and custom rule sets (DDs only, VLS only, etc.)
Amazing Staff Online 24/7 to assure best experience, and staff positions constantly opening
Perfect prayer and magic books (Lunars, ancients, curses, etc.)
Auto-casting
User Friendly Information Panel to display your k/d, voting points, skilling points, etc.
Dicing
Weekly Lottery
Clue Scrolls
Custom Quests w/ Rewards
Tons of minigames
HD minimap
602 NPCs
Level 99 Announcements
Lootshare
Toyhorses
Glory Charging
Custom PK-Tournament arena
Tormented Demons, Godwars Bosses, Corporal Beast, Frost Dragons, and many many more bosses
Custom barrows (every player gets their own individual barrows!)
Enchanting
F-Keys (Old and new)
Ring Of Wealth
Donator Perks
Highscores
Max cape
Tutorial
KDR system
Fully working clans
Advanced Anti-Cheat system
A community of mature, veteran RSPS players who enjoy kicking back and enjoying some RSPS fun

So what are you waiting for? Come join in on the next biggest thing, now!
DementedRSPS.com
